title: A Conversation with Past and Current Gender & Society Editors
itunes:title: A Conversation with Past and Current Gender & Society Editors
description: To celebrate the 50th anniversary of Sociologists for Women in Society, past and current Gender & Society Editors – Judith Lorber, Margaret Andersen, Beth Schneider, Christine Bose, Christine Williams, Dana Britton, Joya Misra, Jo Reger, and Barbara Risman – discuss their contributions, achievements, and challenges in their times as Editor of G&S in this webinar recording.
content:encoded: To celebrate the 50th anniversary of Sociologists for Women in Society, past and current Gender & Society Editors – Judith Lorber, Margaret Andersen, Beth Schneider, Christine Bose, Christine Williams, Dana Britton, Joya Misra, Jo Reger, and Barbara Risman – discuss their contributions, achievements, and challenges in their times as Editor of G&S in this webinar recording.
